name: Alex Easiest Newsletter
author: Alex and Anthony Zbierajewski

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to send a simple HTML newsletter to all of your users within WordPress
See http://anthony.strangebutfunny.net/my-plugins/easiest-newsletter/ for help
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the directory "easiest-newsletter" to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “Newsletter” in the dashboard to configure and send a newsletter to all your users.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compatible with WordPress Multi Site?

Yes!, This plugin has been tested and works on WordPress Multisite, to enable Multisite support, simply change the variable $multisite_enabled to “true” without quotes then activate through your plugins in your network admin.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial Release

2.0

  • Support for WordPress Multisite introduced

3.0

  • Support for WordPress 3.3.2 added
  • Seperate TinyMCE editor added
  • HTML in email fixed

1.0

  • Added option to send newsletter to all commenters
